list-item.p: Patients with homozygous familial hypercholesterolemia (HoFH) have increased cardiovascular risk.
Coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) pandemic affected healthy life behaviors and anxiety of patients with HoFH.
Fear of COVID-19 leads to avoidance of seeking medical care.
As a hospital-based treatment, lipid apheresis is disrupted during the pandemic.
